name: Walking Tour Through Old Surabaya
description: A leisurely walking tour through old Surabaya, taking you first to the Tanjung Perak harbor, where traditional pnisi teakwood schooners can be viewed, and on to the historic Red Bridge area which was the commercial center from the early 1800s to mid-1900s.  There are a number of fine buildings designed by Dutch architects to view and enter here. We will also visit Chinatown and the Arab Quarter and enter one of Surabaya’s oldest food markets, Pasar Pabean.  It will also include a visit to an interesting old clove cigarette factory and museum, and a mid-19th century Chinese temple.
